briefTitle: Evaluation of the Efficacy and Safety of Bempedoic Acid (ETC-1002) as Add-on to Ezetimibe Therapy in Patients With Elevated LDL-C (CLEAR Tranquility)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel Group, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Bempedoic Acid (ETC 1002) 180 mg/Day as Add-on to Ezetimibe Therapy in Patients With Elevated LDL-C
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if bempedoic acid (ETC-1002) added-on to ezetimibe therapy is effective and safe versus placebo in patients with elevated LDL cholesterol.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 12 in Low-Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol (LDL-C)
